name: The Battle of Angels
description:
CHANGE YOUR CITY FROM GHETTO TO PARADISE !

At Startup click on the Flag for that language.

The video game where you play as an Angel. Your mission is to transform this city ghetto into a lovely looking paradise, But, how can you make this happen, you ask? You must confront the existing spirit power there and defeat him. Presently, he rules this city with drug cartels, cocaine lords and much more. You must defeat the one who controls these city structures inside the boxing ring at the Roman Colosseum.



Capture the enemy buildings and gain fight moves by winning boxing bouts.

After clicking on an invitation icon in the city and watching an event taking place. The Angel will then announce his idea for that event's ending. The demon angel, in contrast, will then answer his idea for that same events ending. The winner of the boxing fight will determine the actual ending.

As you start to win fights, it will be noticed that the graffiti and trash in the city will start to disappear. Your enemy will also start to acknowledge you are winning and therefore speed up his attacks on you in the arena. Eventually, the hard core crimes happening in the city will start to be lesser tone in spectrum.

Instead of violence occurring, then the events taking place will begin to be non-violent.

Which one will win? Are You up to the task? Save your people in the city!

PLAY THE GAME - NOW !!!
